name: Death Race (itch) (Lucas Stark)
description:
What looked like a standard race turned out to be a fight for your life. Fight your way to the finish line! Collect weapon packages left on the track and use them to slow down your enemies.

Complete three laps to win the game!

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow keys - movements
  • Space - use weapon

The build uploaded after the deadline fixes a bug with the finish line being invisible.
